```{r}
library(readxl)
data <- read_excel("C:/Users/Jeevan/Desktop/Christ University/Statistics/Linear Regression/death rate-mid sem practical 2.xlsx")
# View(data)
attach(data)
fullmodel = lm(Y~.,data = data)
summary(fullmodel)
step(fullmodel,direction = "backward")
be = lm(Y~X1+X2+X3+X4,data = data)
summary(be)
confint(fullmodel,level = 0.95)
confint(be,level = 0.95)
fit_best = fitted.values(fullmodel)
fit_best
sum(fit_best)
sum(Y)
fit = fitted.values(be)
fit
sum(Y)
sum(fit)
summary(be)$adj.r.squared
```
